data.title: Daniel C. Roper
data.text:
[1] Chairman, Woodrow Wilson reelection campaign, 1916.

Father: John Wesley Roper

Mother: Henrietta V. McLaurin

Wife: Lou McKenzie (m. 25-Dec-1889, two daughters, five sons)

Daughter: Margaret May

Son: James Hunter

Son: Daniel Calhoun

Daughter: Grace Henrietta

Son: John Wesley

Son: Harry McKensie

Son: Richard Frederick

University: Wofford College, Spartanburg, SC

University: BA, Duke University (1888)

Law School: LLB, National Law School (1901)

US Ambassador to Canada (1939)

US Secretary of Commerce (1933-38)

Roper, Hurrey, & Dudley (-1933)

Roper, Hagerman, Hurrey, & Parks (1921-)

Marlin-Rockwell Corporation President (1920-21)

Internal Revenue Service Commissioner (1917-20)

US Official First Asst. Postmaster General (1913-16)

Congressional Staff Clerk, House Committee on Ways and Means (1911-13)

US Official Census Bureau (1900-10)

Congressional Staff Clerk, Senate Committee on Interstate Commerce (1894-97)

South Carolina State House of Representatives (1892-94)

Member of the Board of Atlantic Coast Railroad

Freemasonry

Shriners

Phi Beta Kappa Society

Sigma Alpha Epsilon Fraternity
